LEA.Simulacrum: all damage done to you so far this turn is instead retroactively applied to one of your creatures in play. if this damage kills the creature it can be regenerated; even if there's more than enough damage to kill the creature you don't suffer any of it. further damage this turn is treated normally.
LEA.Conversion: all mountains are considered plains while this is in play. pay during upkeep or this is discarded.
LEA.Sleight of Mind: change the text of any card being played or already in play by replacing one color word with another. for example you can change " counters red spells" to " counters black spells." cannot change mana symbols.
LEA.Drain Power: tap all opponent's lands taking all this mana and all mana in opponent's mana pool into your mana pool. you can't tap fewer than all opponent's lands.
LEA.Regrowth: return any card from your graveyard to your hand.
LEA.Web: target creature gains +0/+2 and can now block flying creatures though it does not gain the power to fly.
LEA.Weakness: target creature loses -2/-1; if this drops the creature's toughness below 1 it is dead.
LEA.Cockatrice: flying any non-wall creature blocking this is destroyed as is any creature blocked by this. creatures destroyed in this way deal their damage before dying.
LEA.Wooden Sphere: any green spell cast by any player gives you 1 life.
LEA.Instill Energy: you may untap target creature both during your untap phase and one additional time during your turn. target creature may attack the turn it comes into play.
LEA.Juggernaut: must attack each turn if possible. can't be blocked by walls.
LEA.Samite Healer: tap to prevent 1 damage to any target.

LEA.Righteousness: target defending creature gains +7/+7 until end of turn.

LEA.Purelace: changes the color of one card either being played or already in play to white. cost to cast tap maintain or use a special ability of target card remains entirely unchanged.
LEA.Aspect of Wolf: target creature's power and toughness are increased by half the number of forests you have in play rounding down for power and up for toughness.
LEA.Timetwister: set this aside in a new graveyard pile. shuffle your hand library and graveyard together into a new library and draw a new hand of seven cards leaving all cards in play where they are; opponent must do the same.
LEA.Jayemdae Tome: you may draw one extra card.
LEA.Scavenging Ghoul: at the end of each turn put one counter on the ghoul for each other creature that was destroyed without regenerating during the turn. if ghoul dies you may use a counter to regenerate it; counters remain until used.
LEA.Deathgrip: destroy a green spell as it is being cast. this action may be played as an interrupt and does not affect green cards already in play.

LEA.Iron Star: any red spell cast by any player gives you 1 life.

LEA.Soul Net: you gain 1 life every time a creature is destroyed unless it is then regenerated.
LEA.Earthquake: does x damage to each player and each non-flying creature in play.

LEA.Ironclaw Orcs: cannot be used to block any creature of power more than 1.

LEA.Savannah: counts as both plains and forest and is affected by spells that affect either. tap to add either or to your mana pool.
